setAnimation(Animation) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Assigns a new animation to the sprite.
setBackground(Color) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the color that the screen is repainted to every frame.
setDimensions(int, int) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets both the width and height of the game.
Note: This function will not work after the create function is executed.
setDimensions(Dimension) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets both the width and height of the game.
Note: This function will not work after the create function is executed.
setFPS(int) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the rough amount of frames the game should display every second.
setFrameNumber(int) - Method in class gametools.Animation
 
setHeight(int) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the height of the game.
Note: This function will not work after the create function is executed.
setLocation(Location) - Method in class gametools.Item
Sets the x and y position of the object using a location.
setLocation(double, double) - Method in class gametools.Item
Sets the x and y position of the object.
setRemoveArea(Item) - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
setRepeatAmount(int) - Method in class gametools.Animation
 
setSpeed(int) - Method in class gametools.Animation
Sets how many frames it will take for the animation to move to the next image.
setSpeed(int) - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Sets the speed the sprite will move at when using its move methods.
setTitle(String) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the title to display at the top of the game window.
setup() - Method in class gametools.Game
Method that runs only once for initializing objects and running setup code.
setWidth(int) - Method in class gametools.Game
Sets the width of the game.
Note: This function will not work after the create function is executed.
setX(double) - Method in class gametools.Item
Sets the x position of the object.
setY(double) - Method in class gametools.Item
Sets the y position of the object.
size() - Method in class gametools.SpriteGroup
 
Sprite - Class in gametools
Used to represent game objects or characters.
Sprite() - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a blank placeholder sprite without an image or animation.
Note: This sprite may cause errors if it is attempted to be drawn without an image or animation first set.
Sprite(Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite in the default location (the corner of the screen) with a custom animation.
Sprite(Location, Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
Sprite(double, double, Animation) - Constructor for class gametools.Sprite
Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
SpriteGroup - Class in gametools
Class for managing and updating groups of sprites.
SpriteGroup() - Constructor for class gametools.SpriteGroup
Creates a blank sprite group.
SpriteGroup(List<Sprite>) - Constructor for class gametools.SpriteGroup
Creates a sprite group and fills it with the passed in sprites.
stopConstantlyMoving() - Method in class gametools.Sprite
Disables the sprite from moving constantly if it was set to do so in a different method.
